name: tvctdrg

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, ctvc), wcel(c1, ctdrg), wcel(c0, ctlm))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ TopVec, c1 ∈ TopDRing, c0 ∈ TopMod)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctvc), wcel(c1, ctdrg))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctvc), wa(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, ctdrg)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopVec → c1 ∈ TopDRing)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopVec ↔(c0 ∈ TopMod ∧ c1 ∈ TopDRing))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctvc), wcel(c1, ctdrg))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctvc), wa(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, ctdrg)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopVec → c1 ∈ TopDRing)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopVec ↔(c0 ∈ TopMod ∧ c1 ∈ TopDRing))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctvc), wa(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, ctdrg)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopVec ↔(c0 ∈ TopMod ∧ c1 ∈ TopDRing))
⊣ c1 =(Scalar ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctvc), wcel(c1, ctdrg))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))

comment: The scalar field of a topological vector space is a topological division ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
